content: The end of the year has been really tough. That doesn't magically change tomorrow, but in the spirit of trying to do little things that make me happy, tonight was a celebration of making/eating food I love (but haven't eaten for almost a year). Hope you all had some niceness too

photo.alt: A square, wooden topped table absolutely full of a variety of dishes (shown in the next few photos). In the background are candles in a fireplace, a plant, and another chair.
Ebi tempura, four types of sashimi, miso cucumber, and a plate of nigiri with ikura gunkan either side
In the foreground are a selection of maki and pickles, with the rest of the sashimi and other dishes blurred behind
Karaage (fried chicken) in a greyish blue bowl
